word_mean: 酸中毒：血液和身体组织内酸积贮或碱储备丧失过多之病理情况，其特点为氢离子浓度增高(pH值降低)。参见alkalosis

sentence.Network_en: A number of intoxicants are associated with metabolic acidosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多毒性物质可引起代谢性酸中毒.

sentence.Network_en: Shock , sepsis, acidosis , hypoxia, and so forth, are treated.
sentence.Network_cn: 对休克,感染, 酸中毒, 缺氧等应加以治疗.

sentence.Network_en: So she doesn't have anoxia, chronic renal failure, or acidosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 那么她没有缺氧症, 慢性肾衰竭, 或者酸毒症.
